top_signals.headline: Bank Indonesia Holds BI-Rate at 5.75% to Support Rupiah Stability
top_signals.impact: The central bank maintained its benchmark rate amid global uncertainty, balancing growth support with currency stability. Foreign reserves remain robust at $151.8B, providing FX intervention capacity.

top_signals.headline: JCI Index Resilient Above 7,200 as Foreign Flows Turn Positive
top_signals.impact: Jakarta Composite Index maintains strength driven by banking and consumer sectors. Net foreign buying resumed as EM sentiment improves on Fed pivot expectations. YTD performance +2.3%.

top_signals.headline: Indonesia Q3 GDP Grows 5.12% YoY, Beats Consensus Estimates
top_signals.impact: Economic expansion driven by household consumption (+4.9%) and fixed investment (+5.1%). Manufacturing PMI at 52.3 signals continued expansion. Full-year growth projected at 5.05-5.15%.

top_signals.headline: Federal Reserve Signals Potential December Rate Cut Amid Cooling Inflation
top_signals.impact: FOMC minutes suggest committee members see conditions for further easing. Core PCE trending toward 2.5% target. Markets pricing 65% probability of 25bp cut in December.

top_signals.headline: Indonesian Rupiah Stabilizes at 15,850/USD on Trade Surplus
top_signals.impact: Currency finds support from continued trade surplus ($10.5B Q3) and BI intervention. Carry trade dynamics remain favorable vs USD. Key resistance at 16,000 level.

top_signals.headline: Indonesian Banks Report Strong NIM Expansion in Q3 Results
top_signals.impact: Major banks (BBCA, BBRI, BMRI) posted 12-15% earnings growth with NIMs expanding to 5.2-5.8%. Loan growth accelerated to 11.5% YoY. NPL ratios stable at 2.1-2.4%.

top_signals.headline: S&P 500 Approaches All-Time High on AI Optimism and Rate Cut Bets
top_signals.impact: Index trading near 6,000 level as tech sector leads. Magnificent 7 stocks contribute 60% of YTD gains. Earnings growth re-accelerating to +8% YoY in Q4.

top_signals.headline: US 10-Year Treasury Yield Falls to 4.35% on Dovish Fed Outlook
top_signals.impact: Bond yields decline as markets reprice Fed trajectory. Real yields at +2.0% remain attractive for fixed income allocations. Duration positioning shifts to neutral.

top_signals.headline: Fed's Goolsbee explains vote against rate cut, says central bank should have waited
top_signals.impact: Chicago Federal Reserve President Austan Goolsbee spoke Friday morning on CNBC.

top_signals.headline: S&P 500 futures retreat after nearing record on Fed as Oracle disappointment drags down AI stocks: Live updates
top_signals.impact: Major U.S. indexes closed higher Wednesday after a divided Fed announced an interest rate cut for the third time this year and ruled out a rate hike.

top_signals.headline: Fed meeting live coverage: Federal Reserve cuts interest rates by 0.25%, Powell says there's 'no risk-free path'
top_signals.impact: The Federal Reserve cut interest rates by 25 basis points at its final meeting of 2025, with investors focusing on the outlook for 2026.

top_signals.headline: Fed Meeting Today: Dow, S&P 500 Steady Ahead of Interest-Rate Decision — Live Updates
top_signals.impact: Federal Reserve voted 9-3 for the move, the first time in six years that three officials cast dissents

top_signals.headline: China Manufacturing PMI Expands to 51.5, Supporting EM Sentiment
top_signals.impact: Factory activity strengthens on stimulus measures and export recovery. Positive read-through for Asian supply chains and commodity demand. EM currencies rally.

top_signals.headline: Brent Crude Holds at $78/bbl as OPEC+ Maintains Production Discipline
top_signals.impact: Oil prices stabilize on balanced supply-demand outlook. OPEC+ compliance remains high at 95%. Inventory levels normalize. Range-bound trading expected near term.

top_signals.headline: JPMorgan upgrades Citigroup as profitability improves
top_signals.impact: JPMorgan has upgraded Citigroup stock to overweight from neutral, citing improving profitability as the key driver for future upside. Analyst Vivek Juneja projects an 11% increase from Thursday's close, setting a new December 2026 price target of $124. The upgrade is based on expectations that Citig

top_signals.headline: Fed votes to reappoint all of its regional bank presidents
top_signals.impact: The Fed on Thursday reappointed 11 of its 12 regional bank presidents, ending a mini-drama at in a move that came a bit earlier than usual.

top_signals.headline: Costco tops Wall Street's sales and revenue expectations
top_signals.impact: Costco said on Thursday surpassed Wall Street's quarterly expectations as its sales rose 8.2% year over year.

top_signals.headline: The bond market is rallying off the Fed’s latest rate cut — but that could change come January
top_signals.impact: The central bank delivered another quarter-point rate cut on Wednesday. Why that decision “could look reckless” come January, according to one investment manager.

top_signals.headline: Rivian announces new AI tech, chip and robotaxi ambitions
top_signals.impact: The company has also developed AI models to power its Autonomy+ subscription, which it intends to roll out early next year for $2,500 up front or $49.99 a month.

top_signals.headline: ‘The next protein’: Fiber is shaping up to be the latest grocery obsession
top_signals.impact: As consumers find their next grocery obsession in fiber, food and beverage companies are racing to keep up with the trend.

top_signals.headline: Cannabis stocks surge on reports Trump will reclassify marijuana; Tilray jumps 28%
top_signals.impact: President Donald Trump will significantly ease federal restrictions on marijuana, according to the Washington Post.

top_signals.headline: Costco’s profits rise as pizzas, pies and Black Friday see record sales
top_signals.impact: Costco shows investors a mixed financial snapshot on Thursday.

top_signals.headline: What the stock market’s post-Fed-meeting optimism may be getting wrong about the U.S. economy
top_signals.impact: The U.S. stock market just booked fresh record highs, despite economic challenges.

top_signals.headline: AI shopping could drive $263 billion in holiday sales. Walmart and Target are racing to get in
top_signals.impact: Consumers are turning to AI chatbots like ChatGPT for gift discovery, reviews and price matching, potentially driving billions in sales this holiday season.

top_signals.headline: Lululemon jumps in premarket after CEO Calvin McDonald announces departure
top_signals.impact: Lululemon's CEO Calvin McDonald will leave the athleisure retailer at the end of January as sales in its largest market sag and consumers flee to competitors.
